plan.text: Set up a daily scheduled task to run at 7am local time
Fetch current weather data for Dubai
If temperature threshold is met, post an alert to Slack

questions.label: Which Slack channel should receive the weather alerts?
Which temperature unit do you prefer?

discoveries.title: Weather data will be fetched for Dubai

pipelines.title: Fetch Dubai Weather
steps: Use weather API to get current temperature for Dubai
Convert temperature to desired unit if necessary

pipelines.title: Post Slack Alert
steps: Compose alert message with current temperature
Send message to specified Slack channel using Slack API
